Description: Wheelmade ceramic jug in kaolinite clay, with a pinched rim, thin neck, single handle stemming from rim to shoulder, bulbous body and fine ring foot. Exterior surface covered with a thick orange-cream slip, and decorated with a frieze on the upper shoulder. Frieze is demarcated by two black painted lines above and below, and filled with painted vine-leaf decoration. Neck partially repaired, one side damaged.
